name: Alien's Journey: Escape
description:
An alien imprisoned in Area 51 wakes up to a new reality. A small mistake gives it an opportunity to escape. Run, jump and shoot your way through the enemies to reach your ship and leave Planet Earth. Along the way, you might discover upgrades to your alien suit and find out how you ended up there.

Made with love by Team B:
